home.title: Hi, I'm Michael
home.tagline: I develop clean and user friendly websites, solve client problems and create awesome designs.
home.about: My overall goal is to help my clients reach theirs. While working in the agency world I have created responsive and user-friendly websites, dynamic and intuitive mobile applications and worked with multiple libraries and frameworks. Have a problem that needs to be solved?

services.description: I create responsive, clean and user-friendly sites. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascipt, and React.
I like to keep things clean and simple. Intuitive for the user and easy on the eyes.
I never want to limit myself to a medium. I like to explore and be creative.
